snippet: Five members of the Russian Parliament have asked the prosecutor general to open a criminal case to investigate the breakup of the Soviet Union and the role played by Mikhail S. Gorbachev.
lead_paragraph: Five members of the Russian Parliament have asked the prosecutor general to open a criminal case to investigate the breakup of the Soviet Union and the role played by Mikhail S. Gorbachev.

headline.main: Russia: Lawmakers Want to Investigate Gorbachev
headline.print_headline: Russia: Lawmakers Want to Investigate Gorbachev
